record.id: field.name="avoidDuplicate" and file.name="SurveyDefinition" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: avoidDuplicate
record.file.name: SurveyDefinition

brief.brief: When this option is active, the user receives only one invitation for the current survey during each survey run.

detail.detail: A user is creating 3 interactions. Based on the filter settings, the survey is selecting these 3 Interactions to send out a survey invitation. The user will receive a survey invitation only for ONE of the opened Interactions.
Based on the filter criteria of the predefined filter, the system is taking always the FIRST record of the search results, to include a reference in the survey invitation.
